segments.text: Do you usually have a birthday party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do.My parents prepare dinner for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you do at the party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We sing " Happy Birthday " at the party and have birthday cakes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know when people began to sing the song " Happy Birthday " ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me tell you the story.In 1892 , Patty Smith Hill and Mildred Hill wrote a song called ' Good Morning to you ' . But later someone added the words ' Happy Birthday ' to their tune .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So the ' Happy Birthday ' song has been popular since then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , actually , the song has been sung since its publication in 1932.People all over the world have sung it in many different languages .
segments.speaker: S1
